dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3951301P] DMCA take-down notice regarding unauthorised content on li
dmca.body:
----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2007 1:01 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3951301P] DMCA take-down notice regarding
unauthorised content on linuxresource.lemonup.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. DMCA take-down notice regarding unauthorised content on
linuxresource.lemonup.com
Added by system at Saturday, May 5 2007 05:54 am 
X-MailFrom: russell@coker.com.au 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat May 5 05:54:15 2007 
Received: (qmail 27673 invoked by alias); 5 May 2007 10:54:15 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: (qmail 27670 invoked from network); 5 May 2007 10:54:15 -0000 
Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 May 2007 10:54:15 -0000 
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Sat, 5 May 2007 05:54:14 -0500 
Return-path: <russell@coker.com.au> 
Delivery-date: Sat, 05 May 2007 05:54:14 -0500 
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) 
 by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from russell@coker.com.au) 
 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
        (Exim) 
        id 1HkHu2-00064m-8K; Sat, 05 May 2007 05:54:14 -0500 
Received: from [61.95.69.195] (helo=nospam.sws.net.au) 
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
russell@coker.com.au) 
        with esmtp (Exim) 
        id 1HkHts-000Av7-NA; Sat, 05 May 2007 05:54:05 -0500 
Received: from localhost (localhost [127.0.0.1]) 
        by nospam.sws.net.au (Postfix) with ESMTP id BFEC5182B3; 
        Sat,  5 May 2007 20:53:59 +1000 (EST) 
Received: from nospam.sws.net.au ([127.0.0.1]) 
        by localhost (nospam.sws.net.au [127.0.0.1]) (amavisd-new, port
10024) 
        with ESMTP id ZX5h+IWNSO9v; Sat,  5 May 2007 20:53:59 +1000
(EST) 
Received: from aeon.coker.com.au (localhost [127.0.0.1]) 
        by nospam.sws.net.au (Postfix) with ESMTP id 712FB1825C; 
        Sat,  5 May 2007 20:53:59 +1000 (EST) 
Received: from localhost (localhost [127.0.0.1]) 
        by aeon.coker.com.au (Postfix) with ESMTP id CCDBB21FE3; 
        Sat,  5 May 2007 20:53:57 +1000 (EST) 
From: Russell Coker <russell@coker.com.au> 
Reply-To: russell@coker.com.au 
To: admins@theplanet.com, 
 abuse@theplanet.com, 
 support@hostgator.com 
Subject: DMCA take-down notice regarding unauthorised content on
linuxresource.lemonup.com 
Date: Sat, 5 May 2007 20:53:48 +1000 
User-Agent: KMail/1.9.5 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; 
  charset="us-ascii" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
Content-Disposition: inline 
Message-Id: <200705052053.50548.russell@coker.com.au> 
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of coker.com.au
designates 61.95.69.195 as permitted sender) client-ip=61.95.69.195;
envelope-from=russell@coker.com.au; helo=nospam.sws.net.au; 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 May 2007 10:54:14.0840 (UTC)
FILETIME=[B89E3B80:01C78F03] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
For discussion of this matter you may contact me at this email address
or by  
phone at +61-4106-54689. 
 
The site linuxresource.lemonup.com (IP address 70.87.170.2 managed by  
hostgator and/or theplanet) seems to only contain content copied  
without permission from my blogs (which are at http://etbe.blogspot.com/
and  
http://etbe.coker.com.au/ ). 
 
My blog license is described at  
http://etbe.blogspot.com/2007/04/lemonup-and-blog-license.html 
 
 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/ 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/feed/ 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/DMCA-etc/ 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/school-rating/ 
 
As of this moment the above URLs only contain content of which I own the

copyright and have not given lemonup permission to use. 
 
Under penalty of perjury I claim sole copyright ownership of all
intellectual  
property on the URLs http://etbe.blogspot.com/ and
http://etbe.coker.com.au/  
apart from any sections expressly marked as quoting others.  I do not
grant  
lemonup.com permission to use it for any commercial purpose (they are  
currently using it to make money through advertising). 
 
http://linuxresource.lemonup.com/ 
 
Also lemonup commit slander of title by claiming copyright of my
original  
content on the above URL. 
 
My first DMCA take-down request was on the 25th of April (and was
acknowledged  
on the same day by a representative of lemonup.com).  It seems that the

operator of lemonup.com is not responsive to DMCA requests and the  
responsibility for removing the pirate content falls on you. 
 
 
PS  I expect responses from both theplanet and hostgator.  If you
believe that  
your company is not responsible for the IP address 70.87.170.2 then
please  
let me know. 
 
--  
russell@coker.com.au 
http://etbe.coker.com.au/          My Blog 
 
http://www.coker.com.au/sponsorship.html Sponsoring Free Software
development
